articles.title: Koreans Meet in U.S.
U.S. Urged to Remain True to AA
articles.content:
Koreans Meet in U.S. 
    Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the United States held meetings for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea in different parts of the U.S. including Washington d.c. and New York from July 24 to 27 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Great Fatherland Liberation War.
 Speeches were made there on the subjects "three movements for changing the situation of the Korean peninsula", "Koreans in the U.S. and movement for the peaceful reunification of the homeland", etc.
